summary: A dimly lit passageway with cobwebs and echoes of dripping water.
detail: You stand in a long, eerie hallway, shrouded in shadows dancing from the slow flicker of torchlight. Cobwebs drape across its cold stone walls, amassing dark secrets and concealing mysterious corners. Delicate whispers of dripping water resonate through the night; capturing cobblestone in a forgotten haze.

expression.content: Up close, skeletal remains of consumed insects hang in the strands of ivory silk. Much thicker than anticipated, the webs overpower those who dare wander unwary.
Discordant droplets syncopate in veiled agony, echoing off abandoned tranquility. Some of them glisten in their unique tales of abdication.
The exquisite chest springs open with clinking triumph, sensing anguish gone awry. Resting dormant within; a jeweled dagger beckons with crimson enchantments.
